pack.description: Deep Alexa cameras: rich mode metadata (capture_gate, delivery, extraction) for ARRI Alexa 35, Mini LF, LF, Mini, AMIRA

device_camera_profiles.notes: Typical iPhone Pro/Pro Max (3x era) profile. HFOV derived from 13mm/24mm/77mm equiv focal lengths.
Typical iPhone Pro Max (5x era) profile. HFOV derived from 13mm/24mm/120mm equiv focal lengths.
Typical non-Pro iPhone profile (Ultra + Main). HFOV derived from 13mm/26mm equiv focal lengths (approx).
iPad models with Center Stage-style front ultra wide (often advertised as 12MP Ultra Wide front camera). Use 120Â° as default.
Fallback iPad camera profile when exact HFOV is unknown. Uses conservative defaults; can be calibrated per device later.
